title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market value in billion GBP, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Market value in billion GBP has increased over the Year
Market value in billion GBP is gradually constant from 2012 to 2016.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Market value in billion GBP about 926.0 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Market value in billion GBP about 650.0 was recorded at Year 2012
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market value in billion GBP, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2015.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2016.
